Header: Appeals Court sets date to take up appeals of Lalith Weeratunga and Anusha Pelpita
Content: The Appeals court has given dates for the debate of the appeals petition filed by former Presidential Secretary Lalith Weeratunge and former Director General of the Telecommunications Regulatory Commission Anusha Pelpita. The date is the 05th of next month. They have been convicted of aiding and assisting and misappropriating a sum of 600 million rupees of the Sri Lanka Telecommunications Regulatory Commission during the last Presidential election period. This appeals petition has been filed challenging the ruling.
